thread.title: BRIEF-Shenzhen Exchange Filing Shows Block Trade Of Hangzhou Hikvision'S Shares Involving 7.2 Bln Yuan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shenzhen Exchange Filing Shows Block Trade Of Hangzhou Hikvision'S Shares Involving 7.2 Bln Yuan

organizations.name: brief-shenzhen exchange filing shows block trade of hangzhou hikvision

text:
Jan 19 (Reuters) - Shenzhen Stock Exchange:
* FILING SHOWS BLOCK TRADE OF HANGZHOU HIKVISION DIGITAL TECHNOLOGY'S 193.0 MILLION SHARES INVOLVING 7.2 BILLION YUAN ($1.12 billion) ON JAN 19 Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2tdwdX9 Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.4010 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
